    • InventoryGui

      public InventoryGui(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory container)
      参数:
      plugin - The plugin to register the event listener. - 注册监听器的插件
      container - The inventory of gui. - Gui的物品栏

    • InventoryGui

      public InventoryGui(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, int size)
      参数:
      plugin - The plugin to register the event listener. - 注册监听器的插件
      size - The size of gui's Inventory. - Gui物品栏的大小

    • InventoryGui

      public InventoryGui(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, int size, String title)
      参数:
      plugin - The plugin to register the event listener. - 注册监听器的插件
      size - The size of gui's Inventory. - Gui物品栏的大小
      title - The title of the gui. - Gui 的标题

    • setButton

      public void setButton(ItemButton button, int position)
      Set a button to a position of gui. - 设置Gui中的按钮
      参数:
      button - The button set to the gui. - 设置到gui中的按钮
      position - The position the button sets. - 按钮设置的位置

    • removeButton

      public void removeButton(int position)
      Remove a button from the gui. - 从Gui中移除一个按钮
      参数:
      position - The posion of the button. - 按钮的位置

    • getButton

      public ItemButton getButton(int position)
      Get a button in the gui. - 从Gui中得到按钮
      参数:
      position - The position of the button. - 按钮的位置
      返回:
      The button in the position. - 这个位置上的按钮

    • getButton

      public ItemButton getButton(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon)
      Get a button in the gui. - 从Gui中得到按钮
      参数:
      icon - The icon of the button. - 按钮的"图标"
      返回:
      The button with this icon. - 这个图标对应的按钮

      public void setContainer(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory container)
